short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unfocus the full screen button after clicking. Letting spacebar pause the video as expected

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Netflix FullScreen Unfocuser" - Seamlessly Pause Netflix Without Interruptions!

Tired of the spacebar accidentally exiting fullscreen mode instead of pausing your Netflix video? Say goodbye to this exasperation with "Netflix FullScreen Unfocuser," a specialized Chrome extension meticulously designed to resolve this issue and provide you with uninterrupted control over your viewing experience.

ðŸŒŸ Key Benefits:

ðŸ”’ Accidental Exit Prevention: Put an end to unintentional fullscreen exits! With "Netflix FullScreen Unfocuser," our extension ensures that pressing the spacebar to pause your video retains its intended functionality, even after clicking the fullscreen button.

ðŸ“º Tailored for Netflix: Exclusively developed for Netflix enthusiasts, "Netflix FullScreen Unfocuser" addresses the specific annoyance of spacebar-triggered exits, enhancing your binge-watching sessions with uninterrupted enjoyment.

ðŸš€ Simple Integration: With just a few clicks, you can effortlessly add "Netflix FullScreen Unfocuser" to your Chrome browser, immediately resolving the spacebar's behavior and giving you back control.

ðŸ”§ No-Fuss Solution: No need to navigate complicated settings. Once installed, the extension seamlessly becomes part of your Netflix interface, ensuring that accidental fullscreen exits become a thing of the past.

ðŸŽˆ User-Centric Design: We empathize with the minor frustrations that can mar your streaming pleasure. "Netflix FullScreen Unfocuser" squarely tackles this issue, allowing you to smoothly transition from viewing to pausing without disruptions.

ðŸ‘¥ For All Netflix Aficionados: Whether you're a solo viewer, sharing content with friends, or enjoying a family movie night, "Netflix FullScreen Unfocuser" caters to everyone. Say farewell to the annoyance of accidental exits and embrace a more seamless streaming experience.

Reclaim control over your Netflix viewing with "Netflix FullScreen Unfocuser." Say hello to uninterrupted pausing, allowing you to focus on your chosen entertainment without the interruption of accidental fullscreen exits. Elevate your movie nights now by installing "Netflix FullScreen Unfocuser" - because seamless control should be a guarantee, not a struggle!
